definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to be in flood/to overflow (the banks)/to inundate/to spread unchecked
lit. to flood (idiom)/fig. rampant/in plague proportions
to make a general reference/to be used in a general sense
pantothenic acid/vitamin B5/to surge up (of acid in the stomach)

sentences.english: The development course of Pan-Turkism has been traced in the thesis.
sentences.chinese: 追溯了泛突厥主义发展的历史。

sentences.english: The presence of Hakkas is pan-China.
sentences.chinese: 在场的客家人是泛中国。

sentences.english: Thereby, the advancement of duality theories is a big milestone in functional analysis.
sentences.chinese: 从而对偶理论的引入是泛函分析中的一次伟大转折。

sentences.english: Part seven provides the concrete measures of cooperation development of trans-regional tourism .
sentences.chinese: 在第七部分提出了泛三角区区域旅游合作开发的措施。

sentences.english: The histological findings of a skin biopsy were consistent with acute generalised exanthematous pustulosis.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤活检组织学检查符合急性泛发性脓疱性皮炎。

sentences.english: Some semiparametric techniques and functional data analysis.
sentences.chinese: 一些半参数技术和泛函数据分析。

sentences.english: Drain the cooked manioc, return to the pan and mash with a potato masher or fork.
sentences.chinese: 排水熟木薯，返回泛醪和一个马铃薯烤至或叉子。

sentences.english: With its glimmering tints of bronze, the building has a striking appearance.
sentences.chinese: 建筑物有着显眼的泛着微光的青铜色外立面。

sentences.english: This product is an inside cookware made of a pan, and a dome lid.
sentences.chinese: 该产品是在炊具一个泛制成，和一个圆顶盖。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for determination of Famciclovir in tablet and capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立泛韦洛韦片剂和胶囊剂含量的测定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To clone new panallergen genes from pollen of Cinnamomum camphora.
sentences.chinese: 目的从樟树花粉中克隆泛变应原基因。
泛德国人的宣传令他感到厌恶。

sentences.english: They sea surges up with laughter, and pale light gleams the smile of the sea-beach.
sentences.chinese: 大海欢笑着翻腾浪花，而海滩的微笑则泛着暗淡的光。

sentences.english: In 19th, Pan-Nationalism appeared with the rising of Nationalism.
sentences.chinese: 19世纪，泛民族主义随着民族主义的兴起而出现。

sentences.english: But it faces opportunity of development on the other hand due to the Pan-Beibu-Gulf cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 但由于泛北部湾合作的缘故它的发展还是面临机遇的。

definition: to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
Xinxing county in Yunfu 雲浮|云浮[Yun2 fu2], Guangdong/Xinxing or Hsinhsing district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
(of markets, industries, infectious diseases etc) rising/emerging/in the ascendant
to be in flood/to overflow (the banks)/to inundate/to spread unchecked
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
to emerge in large numbers/to spring up/to emerge prominently
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony
